com.karmant.syn

Class ValueNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.karmant.syn.SynNode
      • com.karmant.syn.TerminalNode
        • com.karmant.syn.ValueNode

  • public abstract class ValueNode
extends TerminalNode
    A terminal node that has an associated value, like an identifier or an integer number. The value may come either from the input, or from a constant defined in the grammar.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the boolean value.

    • Method Detail

      • getValueType

        public abstract SynValueType getValueType()
        Returns the type of this value.
        Returns:
        the value type. Not null.

      • getValue

        public abstract java.lang.Object getValue()
        Returns the value as an object. For primitive types (integer, boolean, etc.) returns the corresponding wrapper. For string and object values returns the value itself. Does not return null.
        Returns:
        the value.

      • getInt

        public int getInt()
        Returns the int value. The node must be an integer value node with a value within the int range, otherwise an exception is thrown.
        Returns:
        the int value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the node is not an integer node.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the node is an integer node, but the value is out of int range.
        See Also:
        getLong()

      • getLong

        public long getLong()
        Returns the long value. The node must be an integer value node.
        Returns:
        the long value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the node is not an integer node.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString()
        Returns the string value. The node must be a string value node.
        Specified by:
        getString in class TerminalNode
        Returns:
        the string value. Not null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the node is not a string node.

      • getBoolean

        public boolean getBoolean()
        Returns the boolean value. The node must be a boolean value node.
        Returns:
        the boolean value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the node is not a boolean node.

      • getFloat

        public double getFloat()
        Returns the double floating-point value. The node must be a floating-point node.
        Returns:
        the floating-point value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the node is not a floating-point node.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of this value. The representation contains the value type and the string representation of the object value.
        Specified by:
        toString in class TerminalNode
        Returns:
        a string representation.
